name: Planetstar Warrior
description:
Planetstar Warrior is a 2D horizontal side-scrolling space shooter game that puts you up against a invading
enemy force trying to take over the galaxy!

Story
The galaxy is under threat by a mysterious alien force its up to you to stop the onslaught, Equip yourself with
multiple power ups and fight through the increasing enemy waves, Can you reach the mothership and put a stop
to the invasion once and for all?

Key Features
Collect power ups to destroy invading alien spaceships.
Battle through 15 levels of space with increasing difficulty.
Destroy the mothership to save the galaxy.

Tips
Keep moving to avoid enemy fire!
Be sure to grab shields power ups!
Wait for the right moment to use your special!
